skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

security_audit.summary: All 15 static findings are false positives. The scanner triggered on common English words like 'design' and 'algorithm' in prose documentation about frontend aesthetics. This is a pure documentation skill (SKILL.md only) with no executable code, network access, or cryptographic operations. Safe to publish.

content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated interfaces lack character and visual distinction. This skill guides creation of production-grade frontend code with bold aesthetic choices, meticulous attention to detail, and memorable visual design that avoids cliched patterns.
actual_capabilities: Creates production-grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript interfaces
Implements React, Vue, and other framework components
Applies bold aesthetic directions like brutalist, retro-futuristic, or maximalist styles
Designs cohesive visual systems with typography, color, and motion
Avoids generic AI aesthetics like Inter/Roboto fonts and purple gradients
limitations: Does not generate backend APIs or database schemas
Does not implement accessibility features beyond basic considerations
Does not provide design system documentation or component libraries

use_cases.title: Build polished UI components
use_cases.description: Generate production-ready React or Vue components with distinctive visual design and smooth animations.

use_cases.title: Prototype visual concepts
use_cases.description: Create memorable landing pages and interfaces with bold aesthetic choices and creative layouts.

use_cases.title: Add visual polish to apps
use_cases.description: Transform basic wireframes into visually striking interfaces with refined typography and motion.

prompt_templates.title: Basic component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a distinctive [component type] with [aesthetic direction] style. Include hover states and smooth transitions.

prompt_templates.title: Full page
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a complete landing page for [product/service] with [bold|minimalist|retro-futuristic] aesthetic. Include hero section, features, and footer.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive element
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an interactive [component] with staggered reveal animations on page load. Use [CSS|Motion library] for smooth effects.

prompt_templates.title: Complex system
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a cohesive design system with [maximalist|brutalist|organic] aesthetic. Include color variables, typography scale, component patterns, and animation tokens.

output_examples.input: Create a hero section for a coffee shop website with a warm, artisanal aesthetic.
output: A hero section with warm earth tones (#8B4513, #D2691E)
Custom serif display font and clean sans-serif body font
Subtle steam animation using CSS keyframes
Generous negative space with asymmetrical layout
Background texture suggesting coffee grain or foam

best_practices: Commit to a bold aesthetic direction before coding, rather than defaulting to safe choices
Use CSS variables for consistent theming and easy dark mode support
Prioritize one well-orchestrated animation moment over scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using system fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto for production interfaces
Applying generic purple gradients on white backgrounds
Creating layouts that lack a clear visual point of view or memorable character

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: React, Vue, plain HTML/CSS/JS, and other popular frontend frameworks.

faq.question: Does it generate accessible code?
faq.answer: The skill considers accessibility in constraints but focused primarily on visual design quality.

faq.question: Can it create dark mode designs?
faq.answer: Yes, CSS variables make it easy to support both light and dark theme variants.

faq.question: What animation libraries work with this?
faq.answer: CSS animations, Motion library for React, Framer Motion, and vanilla JavaScript transitions.

faq.question: How do I get distinctive typography?
faq.answer: Pair a characterful display font with a refined body font. Avoid common Google Fonts.

faq.question: Can it design mobile-first layouts?
faq.answer: Yes, specify responsive constraints and the skill will design accordingly.
